snippet.title: For The Warp - Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
For The Warp is OUT NOW on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1201830/For_The_Warp/

For The Warp is also available on itch.io:
https://massivegalaxy.itch.io/for-the-warp

For the Warp is a roguelike deck-building game in space!
Explore procedurally generated systems and fight your way to the warp gate.
Encounter allies and foes, ancient civilization ruins, discover new cards and add them to your deck.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/forthewarp
Tumblr: https://forthewarp.tumblr.com/
Press kit: http://forthewarp.com/presskit

Developed by Massive Galaxy Studios
Art by Kirokaze
Music by Martyn Stonehouse
